TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ReflectionPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class ReflectionPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class ReflectionPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: 控制透過 API 對非公用型別和成員的存取。

span.span: Controls access to non-public types and members through the APIs.

summary.span: 控制 API 的一些功能。

span.span: Controls some features of the APIs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不含，程式碼可以使用反映來存取物件的 public 成員。Without , code can use reflection to access only the public members of objects. 程式碼和適當旗標可以存取`protected`和`private`物件的成員。Code with and the appropriate flags can access the `protected` and `private` members of objects. > [!CAUTION] > 因為可存取非公用類型和成員，我們建議，您不會授與網際網路程式碼，除非有旗標。Because can provide access to non-public types and members, we recommend that you do not grant to Internet code, except with the flag. 允許存取非公用成員，必須等於，非公用成員的授權集的限制或非公用成員的程式碼的授權集的子集。 allows access to non-public members, with the restriction that the grant set of the non-public members must be equal to, or a subset of, the grant set of the code that accesses the non-public members. 某些特定功能的反映發出，例如發出偵錯符號，需要與旗標。Certain features of reflection emit, such as emitting debug symbols, require with the flag. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 列舉。For more information, see the enumeration.

summary.span: 建立並傳回目前權限的相同複本。

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
A copy of the current permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一份權限表示與原始的權限資源相同的存取權。A copy of a permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的行為方法。The following code example shows the behavior of the method. 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 程式碼範例會顯示不可示範其使用之方法的行為。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 一般情況下，權限類別的方法所使用的安全性基礎結構。它們通常無法用在應用程式中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission/CS/reflectionpermission.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission/VB/reflectionpermission.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Intersect(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Intersect (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要與目前權限產生交集的權限。

span.span: A permission to intersect with the current permission.

param.span: 必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 建立並傳回目前權限與指定權限交集的權限。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 代表目前權限與指定權限交集的新權限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果交集是空的，這個新使用權限為 。

span.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個權限的交集會描述一組共同兩者描述的作業的權限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 只有通過這兩個原始的使用權限的需求會通過交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的行為方法。The following code example shows the behavior of the method. 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 程式碼範例會顯示不可示範其使用之方法的行為。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 一般情況下，權限類別的方法所使用的安全性基礎結構。它們通常無法用在應用程式中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission/CS/reflectionpermission.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission/VB/reflectionpermission.vb#4)]

exception.span: 參數不是 ，而且與目前使用權限不是相同的型別。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean

param.name: target
param.span: 要測試子集關聯性的權限。

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: 這個權限必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 判斷目前權限是否為指定權限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果目前的使用權限是指定之使用權限的子集，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前權限會指定一組完全包含所指定的權限的作業，目前的權限會是所指定權限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 例如，表示 C:\example.txt 的存取權限是到 c： 代表存取權限的子集\\。For example, a permission that represents access to C:\example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents access to C:\\. 如果此方法傳回`true`，目前的權限，表示沒有存取受保護的資源比指定的權限。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的行為方法。The following code example shows the behavior of the method. 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 程式碼範例會顯示不可示範其使用之方法的行為。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 一般情況下，權限類別的方法所使用的安全性基礎結構。它們通常無法用在應用程式中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission/CS/reflectionpermission.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission/VB/reflectionpermission.vb#2)]

exception.span: 參數不是 ，而且與目前使用權限不是相同的型別。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsUnrestricted() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回值，指出目前的權限是否不受限制。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the current permission is unrestricted.

returns.span: 如果目前的使用權限為不受限制，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不受限制的權限，表示存取權限所保護的所有資源。An unrestricted permission represents access to any and all resources protected by the permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Union(class System.Security.IPermission other) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Union (other As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: other
param.span: 要與目前權限結合的權限，

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: 必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 建立目前權限與指定權限聯集的權限。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 代表目前權限與指定權限聯集的新權限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要呼叫的結果是權限，表示代表的所有作業目前的權限和指定的權限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 傳遞其中一個權限的任何要求會傳遞它們的聯集。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的行為方法。The following code example shows the behavior of the method. 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 程式碼範例會顯示不可示範其使用之方法的行為。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 一般情況下，權限類別的方法所使用的安全性基礎結構。它們通常無法用在應用程式中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications.
